programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Explore the vibrant world of K-pop beyond the hits with "Essential K-pop B-Side Tracks". This playlist brings you hidden gems and fan favorites that shine just as bright as the title songs. With catchy melodies and fresh sounds, each track adds a new color to your favorite artists’ music. Let these standout B-sides brighten your day and become your next go-to songs! (Track List: TWS - Lucky To Be Loved / FIFTY FIFTY - Midnight Special / KISS OF LIFE - Te Quiero / CLOSE YOUR EYES - To The Woods / BOYNEXTDOOR - Crying / ATEEZ - Turbulence / NMIXX - High Horse / fromis_9 - Attitude / P1Harmony - It’s Alright / Kep1er - PROBLEM / ARTMS - Sparkle / ZEROBASEONE - SWEAT / FIFTY FIFTY - Gravity / NEXZ - Simmer / KISS OF LIFE - Igloo / BTS - MIC Drop / TWS - Double Take / ENHYPEN - Brought The Heat Back / &TEAM - Scent of you (Korean ver.) / P1Harmony - Pretty Boy / NMIXX - Soñar (Breaker) / KickFlip - Umm Great / WayV - HIGH FIVE / ENHYPEN - Go Big or Go Home / TOMORROW X TOGETHER - Drama / ILLIT - Lucky Girl Syndrome / NCT WISH - Sail Away (Korean ver.) / STAYC - SLOW DOWN / Stray Kids - The View / SAY MY NAME - 1,2,3,4 / BOYNEXTDOOR - OUR / EVNNE - I love U / ZEROBASEONE - MELTING POINT / YENA - SUGAR / EVNNE - Birthday / OH MY GIRL - Start Up / TWS - hey! hey! / tripleS - Detective Soseol / NiziU - What if / tripleS Visionary Vision - Choom / ILLIT - My World / RESCENE - In my lotion / SEVENTEEN - Our dawn is hotter than day)

programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Experience the refreshing vibe of summer with the "Essential Summer Soundtrack". From the thrill of road trips to the warmth of sunlit days, this playlist brings summer to life through music. With upbeat energy, catchy choruses, and breezy rhythms, each track captures the essence of what makes K-pop summers unforgettable. Let the music carry you into your own sun-drenched story. (Track List: OH MY GIRL - Summer Comes / SEVENTEEN - Oh My! / ONF - Popping / GFRIEND - Sunny Summer / KISS OF LIFE - Sticky / SF9 - Summer Breeze / TWICE - Dance The Night Away / EXO - Ko Ko Bop / fromis_9 - Stay This Way / THE BOYZ - THRILL RIDE / Red Velvet - Red Flavor / GFRIEND - Fever / ZEROBASEONE - BLUE / OH MY GIRL - Nonstop / Girls’ Generation - PARTY / SHINee - View / CRAVITY - PARTY ROCK / TWS - / RESCENE - LOVE ATTACK / (G)I-DLE - DUMDi DUMDi / ATEEZ - WAVE / Apink - Remember / SEVENTEEN - Our Dawn Is Hotter Than Day / OH MY GIRL - Dolphin / STAYC - Bubble / TWS - Countdown! / fromis_9 - WE GO / cignature - Poongdung / TEMPEST - Unfreeze / Red Velvet - Umpah Umpah / SF9 - SCREAM / TOMORROW X TOGETHER - Blue Orangeade / OH MY GIRL - Dun Dun Dance / ONF - Beautiful Beautiful / NCT DREAM - We Young / Red Velvet - Power Up / TWS - hey! hey! / WJSN (Cosmic Girls) - Boogie Up / SEVENTEEN - VERY NICE / THE BOYZ - D.D.D / Kep1er - Up! / ZEROBASEONE - Feel the POP / Kwon Eun Bi - Underwater)
